text: Chris Reynolds is a Welsh comics author who has been creating his Mauretania comics since the mid-1980s, including an homonymous full-length graphic novel publishing by Penguin Books in 1990. In 2005, Canadian author Seth considered him "the most underrated cartoonist of the last 20 years".
